alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 3:02AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches with higher amounts near the Grand Canyon. Winds gusting 30 mph to as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Grand Canyon, North Rim, Pinetop- Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Friday: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 4 to 8 inches North Rim 7 to 11 inches Pinetop-Lkside 3 to 5 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
